message.entry: Incorrect number of input arguments. Specify a function handle with the ''ReadFcn'' parameter.
The UniformRead option must be a logical 1 (true) or logical 0 (false).
BlockSize can only be customized if the ''ReadMode'' option is set to 'bytes'.
The {0} method on FileDatastore can only be used if the 'ReadMode' option is set to 'file'.
